record.title: APPOINTMENT OF CONFEREES--H.R. 1495
record.chair: The Chair, as to H.R. 1495, appoints Mrs. Boxer, Mr. Baucus, Mr. Lieberman, Mr. Carper, Mrs. Clinton, Mr. Lautenberg, Mr. Inhofe, Mr. Warner, Mr. Voinovich, Mr. Isakson, and Mr. Vitter conferees on the part of the Senate.

speaking.paragraph: I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
